about_the_game:
Meet the mischievous Aki, the impassioned Haru, and the ruthless, iron-fisted Fuyu.

For two hundred years, these ancient kitsune have searched for a way to break the curse that binds them - a curse that has stripped them of their powers and trapped them in fox-form. Despite their shattered magic, they remain dangerous in their own ways. Will your love be enough to quell their bitter rivalry? Will it be enough to save them?

This bundle unlocks:

  • Three new fully-dateable characters for your Blush Blush game
  • Captivating voice performances for all three guys
  • An assortment of gorgeous Outfits (available at Lover+1)
  • Plus a few surprise features you’re sure to love!
  • Experience a Blush Blush love story like no other - with the Kitsune Bundle!
detailed_description:
Meet the mischievous Aki, the impassioned Haru, and the ruthless, iron-fisted Fuyu.

For two hundred years, these ancient kitsune have searched for a way to break the curse that binds them - a curse that has stripped them of their powers and trapped them in fox-form. Despite their shattered magic, they remain dangerous in their own ways. Will your love be enough to quell their bitter rivalry? Will it be enough to save them?

This bundle unlocks:

  • Three new fully-dateable characters for your Blush Blush game
  • Captivating voice performances for all three guys
  • An assortment of gorgeous Outfits (available at Lover+1)
  • Plus a few surprise features you’re sure to love!
  • Experience a Blush Blush love story like no other - with the Kitsune Bundle!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or newer or SteamOS
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13+
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Blush Blush - Kitsune Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Three ancient fox-spirits. Three men forever linked by their rivalry… and by the curse they share. Three chances to experience falling in love like never before. This content requires the base game Blush Blush on Steam in order to play.
